name: tailwind-v4-shadcn
description: Production-tested setup for Tailwind CSS v4 with shadcn/ui, Vite, and React. Use when initializing React projects with Tailwind v4, setting up shadcn/ui, implementing dark mode, debugging CSS variable issues, fixing theme switching, migrating from Tailwind v3, or encountering color/theming problems. Prevents tw-animate-css errors, duplicate @layer base issues, and includes complete dark mode support with ThemeProvider.
